content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were driving south on starkey blvd in new port richey between decubellis and seven springs when i happened to glance up toward the sky through my windshield. i saw what i, at first, thought was a plane but, upon closer inspection, i saw no wings, no windows, no markings and no tail fin like all airplanes have. this object was flying low enough that i could clearly see it was silver in color and had no other characteristics of an airplane. it was too big to be a small aircraft yet, smaller than a commercial aircraft. the craft was flying from west to east.

as i watched the object flew into the bottom section of a cloud just a few thousand feet above us to the south. i waited for it to come out the other side. the cloud that this craft flew into was tall but not very wide. any airplane would have come out the other side in just 3-4 seconds. this did not. it just disappeared into the cloud. unfortunately, my husband did not see it and i had not mentioned it until the object neglected to appear on the other side of the cloud.
this is only the second time i have seen something that i cannot identify. both sightings have taken place in the same area within the past 2 months.
it's hard for me to believe that no one else saw this object yesterday.
content.summary: Long, silver, cigar shaped object flew into cloud and didn't come back out.

content.detailedDescription:
This was a pretty high event, unlike the previous night that i was witness with another report you recieved from friends of mine yesterday.
a friend and i were on the roof with a 114mm telescope checking out the rings of saturn when i noticed a bright light moving from west to east at a pretty high altitude. at first i thought it may have been a plane but after training the telescope on it i could see it was not. i will admitt that it is possible that it was a very low flying satallite but from my experience the was much to close and bright for that and moved too quickly from horizon to horizon. the other thing i considered was the shuttle. i know it is up right now. i just couldent identify this one at all.
content.summary: Bright oval light crossed over head . solid lighting with no strobes.

content.detailedDescription:
I have told this story to a handfull of people (believers and non-believers), and to this day the event remains very accountable to the events of what we saw. i always wondered if anyone else saw what we saw. i do not know where the other eye witness is these days, but i'm sure he would tell the story the same as i would. so here goes.

are you familiar with detroit? we lived in what is known as "new center", which is an area about 2 miles north of downtown detroit and just west of woodward avenue on bethune street. our house was right next and east of   the john lodge expressway. this neighborhood (street) no longer exists anymore. at somepoint gm bought out the complete neighborhood and renovated every home and put up high priced condo's, complete with security walls and private security. the "new center" area is the home to the fisher building, a beautifull skyscaper complete with a lit up golden top and was thus nicknamed "the golden tower of the fisher building". at one time this buliding housed the detroit am radio station wjr. also in new center was the home head quarters of gm, before they moved to the ren cen. it was an area of homes, a few skyscrapers, restaurants and hotels, not far away one would find the home of mowtown, the henry ford hospital, and wayne state university.

it was summer, could of been june, july or even august, all i remember about that, was that it was hot. the year i believe to be is 1975. my room mate jeff fields was standing on the front porch. our front porch faced south. if you were standing on this porch, the golden tower of the fisher building would have been on your left, 3 blocks east and two blocks south. to the right of the porch would have been the john lodge expressway and the service drive for the expressway. myself i was sitting in the living room of the house reading a science fiction novel (please don't hold that against me) when considering weather my accountability is authenic or not. it was dark outside, approximatly 9 or 10pm when my friend jeff yelled out, "john, come here"! i admit i was really enthralled into my novel and ignored jeff. jeff yelled out again, " john you got to come here, quick". i again ignored his request, but when jeff sounded frantic and yelled out, "john come here, you ain't going to believe this", i slowly got off the couch and walked out onto the porch and said, "okay, what?" jeff who was standing on my lefy pointed to the sky and said, "do you see that?" at the time i didn't see anything so i said, "see what?" jeff said, "you don't see that?" "see what", i again exclaimed. at this point jeff's finger was shaking as he was pointing to the sky and his voice was rather loud when he said, "you don't see that?" and well so i did, and at this point neither one of us said a word until what we saw was gone from out view.

what we saw was a classical flying saucer, right out of the movies if you will. it was hovering above the new center area south of the howard johnsons but only maybe a few hundred feet above the entire new center landscape area. if it had been daylight you could have told what type of plane it might have been, it was flying that low. there wasn't any noticable sound coming from the craft. even though it was dark you could still make out the outline of the object. my guess is that if it would have landed it would taken up the entire footprint of the howard johnsons restaurant and hotel. it had what looked like large rectangular lights on the side that were moving counter clockwise. it hovered here for a while sometimes moving up and slightly west. we had what seemed like quite a few moments to witness this. slowly the saucer shaped object continued to move due west. after is had past over the john lodge expressway the lights seemed to rotate a bit faster, and then a bit faster yet, when all of a sudden the lights blurred together and headed in a south west direction toward old tiger stadium and within seconds the speed of this craft was gone from our sight. i had this feeling over me that i had just witnessed a once in a lifetime event, it left me in awe, but gratefull to now truly be able to say that, "yes, i belive that there is life on other planets". i am not embarrased to tell this story, or afraid that people might think i am "nuts".

overall we estimated we had at least 3 minutes to witness this craft, and we talked about it often. we looked the next day to see if there were any reports in the paper, but this was in the "old days" before the internet and found no other reports of this sighting. i found this amazing that we could never find any other eye witness's. my dad, although retired at the time worked for the faa at metropolitan airport, and was always getting called on planes out and about over detroit that were not supossed to be there, and yet this object to my knowledge was never picked up on a radar.

well i know what we (i) saw, and it was classic. i have always believed that there was or is life outside of this planet, but after seeing this i became a true believer.My wife and i both intend to become members of mimufon and mufon soon. contact me if you wish. thank you.

please note that there was another time i witnessed something unidentifiable in the sky. this time it was not the classic saucer shape i witnessed in this report, but something more bizarre, and i still am not sure what it was that i saw. i will make those claims in another report due to the nature of the time and people involved. 

sincerely, 
john reed
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was not a short glimpse. witnessed by two people for over 3 minutes+, then took off.

content.detailedDescription:
I have had quite a few sightings that i have reported to mufon and although i believe most could be explained away my last sighting (the one about the pulsating 15 min light) and this one i posted tonight have me convinced that these two sightings were not natural by any means though perhaps this one may be military but it certainly felt other worldly if that's possible.

again i had a witness with me and it was the  same person who saw the last sighting with me this time however we were speechless and did not talk to one another till after the sighting because we were taken by surprise to see something so big. i mean when we noticed and looked at the lights we swore a plane was about to fly in to your apartment! it took a really long time to glide across the sky however it seems as if we were looking at it for almost 20 minutes.

when it first appeared there was a helicopter hovering around it but it seemed to fly away very fast for some reason then the craft which when all electronics in the house were turned off and the windows open we could not hear anything but oddly enough we could feel a vibration i can't really put it in to words. what really got me and my friend however is that it looked like a giant boomerang, it was really big i don't know how to really explain it only that we both agree it was the biggest craft we had ever seen. i wish i could show you how big it was it was easily 2-300 feet wide, unfortunately though this time we weren't equipped with the tools needed for evidence...We just didn't think we would see something again and especially like this. but then to top it all off the craft began to suddenly fly vertically and it looked like a giant vertical boomerang in the sky.
content.summary: Silent triangle craft glides across the skyway too perfectly to be natural.

content.detailedDescription:
Murrysville, pa:  i was still up around 4:00am... had been looking off and on all night for a 3rd return of the orange ufo we saw on 5/18/09 and 5/13/09.. was ready with my new, 2- day-old $1200 sony hdr-xr500v hd camcorder, celestron skymaster giant binoculars 20x80.......(still waiting for the tripod and telephoto lens).
i thought, i may as well take another bathroom trip before turning in... when i came out, i thought, "why not take one last look?" saw a flashing something craft going kinda slow and low (only about an 1 inch over the treeline in front of my house).

i thought... "what the hell is that?"  opened the window to get a better look because i didn't have my glasses on... and

no sound!   i ran to the bar in living room to grab the new camcorder.. i wrestled frantically at the patio door lock, ran out onto the deck and filmed this thing!  it was heading west approx., and was lost behind some large trees... ran to the bedroom at the west end of my house to see if it would come out of trees, but it didn't.  you can hear on the video only some ambient highway noise and crickets, followed by me whispering "where'd it go?".

before you think it's just a helicopter or plane, look how the torpedo thing on right side changes--the porthole/exhaust hole-looking things changes, doo-dads are seen on top in one photo.. and, look closely at ufoprobe39big.Jpg... there's square windows lit up by the flashing light!..... oh  yeah, and let's not forget about the little probe.  didn't notice it too much at playback until i did the frame-by-frame... whizzes past the craft from the right to the left!  in one blow up, it looks bullet shaped with 2 holes. 

these things have been seen by paul and i moving silently overhead for a couple of months now (the 5th one we noticed--wonder how many we didn't)... thought it was weird, but thought because of the flashing lights they were just some sort of plane... we're not plane buffs, but we'd never seen planes with 3 white lights on the back with a big red light underneath....The flashing lights where the wing tips should be are what throws you off.  i think they've figured out how to pretend to be our planes so they can travel without hassle.  except the no noise part...

i had seen it earlier in the night with my giant binoculars, but it was too far away to see anything but the 2 lights on back and flashing (going at an angle, only 2 show).

by the time i got a decent look and was heading right towards down the street thru the woods... only 35 seconds of video--but it is in blu-ray format! 1440 x 1080.  (i'm a little bummed to realize today that i could've had a 12.1mp photo during recording if i had pressed the photo button....Sigh).

i'm soooooo excited!!!!!!  we've seen many different kinds of unidentified flying objects (vertical rod, neon green & orange fireballs, red pulsating disk, star-like bright round ones, comet type horizontal flying one, huge cigar with probes, a neon green light orb in iowa, a v-shaped one, a smaller oblong silver one, and a small, softball-to-soccer ball-sized silver orb, but this one takes the cake!)

go ahead, look at the video and blow ups and say it with me...."what the hell is it???!!"

update:  video presentation done with blown-up stills in slow-motion playback.  video is untouched, stills only had 'sharpen' and/or brightness/contrast adjusted to see detail.  posted on my youtube channel (plus enjoy my pre-screened "favorites" videos--all are impressive non-fake ones), at:

www.Youtube.Com/seeingufospa


oh yeah, i copyrighted all the images so i could possibly get compensated for my lack of sleep and equipment costs.  it's only fair.  all rights reserved and all that stuff....
content.summary: Murrysville:  triangle-ish ufo w/probe caught on hd video!!!!! alien research craft?

content.detailedDescription:
In the summer of 1967 at the edge of irving, texas my then boyfriend (later husband and now ex-husband) and i were driving to visit his aunt and uncle when i noticed a light behaving oddly (starting and stopping) in the sky. upon arriving at his aunt's home (an apartment complex), my boyfriend suggested they come look at the light. the aunt, uncle, their three children (aged from about 9 to 15), the boyfriend and i all went out to look a for the light. we were in an newly developed area and surrounded by low woods. at first i was looking in the sky and did not spot it. in a hushed voice the aunt said "i see it!" and i looked at her. her eyes were huge and she looked stunned. i said "where?", and she pointed at ground level. i then saw not a light but an object not in the sky, as i expected, but rising from some nearby trees. it was about the size of two or three of the treetops, and it was shaped like two shallow bowls placed together at their edges. there was a row of lights around the center (at the junction of the rims of the two bowls). the lights were orange and the entire object glowed orange, although the lights were so bright that i could not tell if the object was orange or if it was metallic and reflecting the orange of the surrounding band of lights. this was clearly an object, not a light or a reflection. it rose slowly (straight up) until it was well into the sky (i will guess 500 to 800 feet, though i am not a very good judge of altitude).
it remained stationary, and after a few minutes the lights changed color and started flashing in a sequence of red, white and orange. the different lights were different colors at any given time and i could not discern a pattern to the color changes. the object remained still for several minutes, flashing the red, white and orange lights. the lights were again too bright for me to be sure of the color of the object, but it either glowed or was highly reflective. after several minutes, it took off at a 45 degree angle and vanished in seconds. it did not simply disappear, it grew smaller with distance as it left, so i knew it was flying away, but it flew so rapidly as to be gone from sight in seconds.
our little group returned to the house and after briefly reassuring one another that we had all seen it, we sat in absolute silence for a while. my feeling was that i had seen something that was impossible, and i sat in silence trying to reconcile what i had seen with what i believed to be possible. i guess we sat there for 30 min. to 1 hour, because then it was time for me to get home (i had to be home by 10:00pm). i suppose we were all too stunned to talk about it. what was there to say? even the children were silent. i reported it to carswell air force base in fort worth, but they did not seem interested and may have thought it was a prank. it wasn't. i have tried to find other people who saw it or something like it. i met a man (we became friends) who saw an identical object on a rural road near hallsville, texas (at night that same summer) and followed it in his car until it took off over trees where he could not follow. he was closer to the object than my group, and he said it made a humming sound (i heard no noise). there were absolutely no drugs or alcohol involved in our sighting. my now ex-husband will not discuss it other than to say he saw something because he says people will think he's crazy if he describes what he saw. i am not crazy. i did dream once about it several years later. i dreamed that i awoke to find that my room was filled with brilliant orange light. i don't remember the middle of the dream, but at the end i felt contaminated with the light, as if i were glowing orange. i only mention this as a reaction to seeing the object. i read of your site when i saw mention of a woman in texas who had seen something similar to this in 1967. i have always wondered how many people saw what i saw, and if they have any explanation for it.
content.summary: Saw glowing orange with orange lights object rise from nearby trees, remain stationary, lights changed to red, white and orange, then took off at 45 degree angle.

content.detailedDescription: Playing ball(fetch) with my dog outside my house i noticed a beam of light coming from distant clouds, it did not illuminate the clouds. it was after sunset and it was the brightest area in the sky at the time. a cloudy sky at the time did not appear to disrupt the beam, and the light faded away as the clouds cleared that spot. it was insight and did not flicker or change appearance for the 15 minutes i observed it. we live not far from a hospital and frequently have helicopters taking patients from there to melbourne the light was as bright as the searchlight they use but it remained stationary. i hope someone else witnessed this other than my wife and i.
content.summary: Vertical light beam over port phillip bay.

content.detailedDescription: Went out side to smoke a cig, around 9:20 p.M saw a very bright white light slowly moving overhead. heading west to east the front was very bright, underneith was very bright, and behind it was very bright, it looked like a star in the night sky but it was like maybe a 1000 feet above me . no sound, very cool whatever it was? from beginning of my sighting to end was maybe 3 minutes, i'm listening to the scanner now airport and police havent heard anything. whatever it was and how low it was i was expecting to see some kinda flashing lights like a aircraft has. the whole thing was bright white. ??????
content.summary: Very bright light came over the house, never seen a light like it very bright and quiet

content.detailedDescription: On a recent trip with my partner heading towards big bend state park , just past marathon texas. while driving around noon on a sunny day ,i noticed a shadow cross over the hood of the car. i thought it was probably a bird casting a shadow . within seconds out of the corner of my right eyes i saw something very bright heading towards the passenger side of the window at a rapid speed . i turned my head towards the passenger window and noticed that my companion was staring out at the same object. it looked like a extremely bright form with blowing armlike extensions faster than seconds it appeared to pass thru the car . the entire car interior was white , absolute white , i could not see anything outside nor inside, although i was still facing the passenger .The stereo was on but i dont remember any sound either just glowing bright light. i��� have no idea how long the form took to pass completely thru the car . the car seemed to move back and forth with a jolt . the next thing that i remember is that my hands grabbed the steering wheel and i turned towards my partner and said " why are we doing this ." we apparently were still facing each other , he has a terrified look on his face and shakes��� his head. i said " what happened ?" he said something hit the car.��� i reached out and stopped the swinging motion of the cross hanging from the rear veiw mirror . realizing that the swinging motion supported the fact that the car had moved voliently. i look in the rear veiw miror to see if anything was behind the car , as if i had hit something. their is noithing behind us .Both of us turn and look out of the window trying to determine what had slammed into the automobile . nothing around us behind us . i almost stopped but thought that whatever had hit the car might somehow somewhere be outside . i slowed down still visually searching for some kind of animal , object , thing but nothing seemed visible.Let me mention that it was around noon on a clear day. i had a clear mind and was in a calm mood . i am a logical person and do not seek fiction in life . factual and senseable . this is a occurance that both my partner and myself witnessed at the exact same time .
content.summary: Glowing white light slams into car.

content.detailedDescription: i wnet out my back door to have a cigerette and looked up in the sky and i saw a super bright white light, crossing from nw to se, and it wasn't up high enough to be a satellite, and going too fast ot be a commecerial airliner. don't know what i saw, but i am an avid sky watcher, and never seen something like this. i know i'm not crazy, so if you can check and see if it might have been a satellite for me i would appericate it. i was totaly freaked out, i know i saw something that i usually don't see out here at night
content.summary: Super bright white light.

content.detailedDescription:
I was playing a donkey kong video game while sitting on my couch near the window which faces south.  i caught a glimpse of a bright light to my right, the south, in the tree line of a maple tree.  at my vantage point of the couch the light and halo was approx nickel sized at arms length.  i yelled for my girlfriend to follow me outside to see it, as i ran out in my boxers, it just kept flying very smooth in an east direction over the city of marquette until it faded to sand grain size over the old harbor of marquette on lake superior.  i definitely felt in awe of the object i had seen up close and then as it moved away my girlfriend acted a little out of the ordinary and said she felt "creeped out", or that it was "creepy out in the dark", though when asked shortly after her feelings and reactions, she said "i felt like i was being watched".  however, i felt nothing out of the ordinary, just impressed.

beautiful.
content.summary: Bright white light, almost light light blue, flew noiselessly into the distance.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were driving to go to montgomery mall, and just made a right turn coming from tower oaks blvd to montrose ave. and to take the 270 s. exit.

i then pointed out to my wife an odd looking object (driver side) hovering just above the trees.  i initially thought it was just a plane.  but, looking at it closer, it was definitely clear that it was something different.

the unidentified flying object had 3 white lights from each point of what appears to be triangle shape object; it also has a flashing red or amber light in the middle.

the object was just hovering and not moving at all, and without making any noise.  it also looked like it was a bit tilted to the right side.  i then made a u-turn from montrose ave. that we can see the object even more, but right after we made the turn, the object disappeared.
content.summary: Ufo sighting by montrose ave.

content.detailedDescription: On my way too work this morning, i saw a odd shaped object, dark cloud looking. then i noticed it was moveing and tumbleing, and there was what looked too be a twin blade helicopter what looked too be about a half a mile away from the object, that looked to be zig zagging.
content.summary: Diamond shaped, looked like a twin blade helicopter approximately 1 half mile in front.

content.detailedDescription:
In south dakota this time of year its cold at nigt this night was breezy and warm enough to sit on my swing in the 
back my 5 yr old daughter was with me as school is out, when i noticed a very bright light to my right going west to 
east and i told my daughter look do you ee that light right there as i pointed she says yes mommy i want to go in now.  
i stayed outside and whispered to my husband in the kitchen "come here" and he was too late the big silent non 
blinking white lite dissappeared behind a tree and was gone.  i like sitting outside when the weather allows so a few 
months back i have seen something i repoted to mufon and the response was it wasn irridium flash satellite,  well 
 this was not tha and i can point sattellites out like cazy and i know how slow they go this big light was riding 
the sky fast.
content.summary: Big brite silent light going from west to east fast then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my back porch with my wife and her cousin around 10 pm. i noticed what appeared to be a bright satellite (moving at a similiar speed to a satellite from south to north). i said wow, that cant be one, its too bright, maybe its the space station or the space shuttle. then the light dimmed as i said that and disappeared entirely. from the beginning to end the diameter was as large as vega in the beginning and as small as a pin prick when it vanished.

15 minutes later i was in my backyard with a friend, and as i remembered the sighting. i told him emphatically how weird it was to see something so bright and know it was not a plane. at that moment, he said "like that?" i turned around (facing west towards lake washington) and a very bright oval/sphere object about the size of a dime in the sky moved from behind and a above a row of trees about 100 to 125 yards from our position. he then said "thats not a plane" i agreed and proceeded to become nervous because i had the  feeling that it knew we knew about it and once i said something it had appeared. it stayed in plain sight above the tree line at 500 to 1500 feet up. i have lots of aircraft fly over from large airliners to small float planes and traffic cessna's so determining the height was very easy. it moved west to east in a slow up and down undulating motion that almost seemed to be playing with my line of sight as i ran to the corner of my yard to keep it in sight.
as i took up another clear view it suddenly dimmed itself out into an ever smaller ring that went from the brightest white light i have ever seen to an orangish brown ring the size of what i can only describe as  a needle point.
i took a very poor cell phone video of the sighting, but it is like i said poor.

i have never seen something so big , so low and so quiet. i have a witness , and he will attest to this as well.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo makes low fly 2nd appearance after first sighting.

content.detailedDescription: Apologies for remaining anonymous but i don't wish to be contacted.  this incident occurred approximately july/august of last summer around 9-10pm.  my wife and i were driving home to vail eastbound on i-70 from edwards, with the arrowhead development on our right off the highway, when we both saw a large triangular array of slowly blinking red lights, in what looked to be a formation, moving initially approximately 150mph come from behind off our right hand side, moving over the valley (again the arrowhead area) at an altitude, approximately, of about 200 feet above ground level moving eastward parallel to i-70 and in an upwards trajectory of about 10-15 degrees.  it wasn't what looked like a craft but rather a triangular array of red lights, and what looked to be about 100 yards between the points.  in a matter of a 2-3 seconds later, the lights accelerated at an exponential rate, zooming off to the east and turning slightly towards the northeast before disappearing over the mountainous horizon.  the rate of acceleration was much greater than any normal jet or even rocket is capable of, in my estimation.  there were no other cars next to us at the time so i doubt we could be mistaking a light reflection on our windshields for this phenomenon, and my wife and i compared notes and saw what we believe to be the same thing.  at first i thought the object was an aircraft, but again i didn't see any craft, just blinking red lights, and the lights were so far apart that it would be too big for any aircraft i am aware of, and i have a good knowledge of aircraft.  also, it would be highly unusual for any aircraft or formation of aircraft to be flying in this airspace at this rate of speed, and in my estimation impossible for any normal aircraft to accelerate like this and dissapear over a horizon tens of miles away in a matter of a couple of seconds.  both of us were speechless for a few moments and literally coundn't believe what we saw.
content.summary: Large triangular formation 3 lights accelerating from slow to fast disappear over horizon.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside looking up at the stars (about 10:50 till 10:56pm)i watched a plane(jet airliner) crossing the sky from west to east(probably from sac/metro airport). all of the sudden a extremely bright light appeared rather close to the plane crossing the sky. it looked like it was off to the left(north) and kind of behind the plane. it was very bright and wight. it was much brighter than the lights that they use on airliners.I cant stress enough how bright and wight the light was. and i know that there where no other airplanes in the sky in the direction that i was looking(i was looking east north/east).
   the light did not move(at first) as far as i can tell, it only lasted for about maybe 10 to 15 seconds. and it was extremely bright. it looked  like it was perty close. at first i thought it was a plane coming in to land at westover field in sutter creek ca. (about 2 miles south of me)but there was no sound at all,i could still here the airliner in the sky. and it was lined up wrong for a landing there. 
 after about 10 to 15 seconds the light dimmed down but not out and took off towards the east south/east.It got dimmer than most of the stars in the sky in about 5 to 7 seconds as it was moving. i had to strain to see it once it finished moving. i still saw it heeding what looked like the east south/east when it was dim then it stopped and went the other direction(north) after around 5 seconds later i lost it .
  it went a good 8 fingers towards the north before i lost it. when it was dim it look like a satellite in the sky but when it turned to head the other direction i knew it was not a satellite. 
  i saw no shape just wight, very bright light, it just appeared as far as i can tell. i go outside at night all the time to look at the night sky, i like to look for satellites and well just look at the sky ... i have seen lots and lots of satellites before, this was not one!!!!!! 
   i have seen other things before too but you have to call me to talk about those,they are nothing big... but i'm still trying to figure it out, and till im sure it not something man made.... then i will type it out but i could use some help to figure it out so please give me a call 
thank you s.D.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A very bright light apered then went dim and shot away

content.detailedDescription:
Night, fri. 5/22/09, 11:33 est, same exact time as prior night's event, same exact location in sky, but this night there was only one light/object in the near horizon night sky focal location, unlike the night before when there were a total of 3 lights/objects i observed. this night, had made sure my bi-noculars were out and ready for just this reason. caught the light/object in my noculars, focused as best poss., observed same exact strobing lights, same exact colors (blue/white/green/no red), same exact lack of flash pattern to them, totally unlike any commercial, or even non-commercial aircraft faa requirements/regulations i can think of. light would bop up/down, left/right, above/below treeline (treetops) directly across street neaighbors yard, same reference points i used night before. i have to be honest, i got kind of frustrated with it, it seemed to be playing games with, i think who/whomever may have been observing it. this is going to sound crazy, but i got so frustrated with it's "games", i kind of spoke out loud, as if maybe it had some wild intensive listening technology, hoping it might hear me, and i reprimanded it numerous times for being silly, and low and behold it disapeared. i'm not naive enough to think it actually responded to my criticism, but it did give me a chuckle.
 anyhow, event duration approx. 10 min. pretty much same exact event this time except this time only one light/object involved. sincerely, matt savadel, newark, de.  p.S., please foreward to butch witkowski, or whoever is in his place at the time of your getting this report. will be on look out for it tonight! thanks.
content.summary: Went outside same time night after 1st event, this time only 1 star/light/object. up-down, right/left movement.

content.detailedDescription:
It was late at night on march 29, 2009. i was lying in bed, trying to go to sleep, when i heard a quiet rumbling/vibrating noise outside. i had previously seen a ufo on march 19 (the report is on mufon if you want to check it out), which had made a quiet rumbling/humming noise. i quickly made a connection between the sounds, and leaped to my window to see what i could see. i searched the night sky, hoping to see something intriguing. after a few seconds, i saw a large triangular craft fly directly overhead. it approached me from behind, and apparently flew right over my house. it had 3 brilliant, bright white lights (1 on each corner). after about 5 seconds, it slowly turned left and flew out of sight. i was indoors, and i wasn't really able to see it after it turned left, so i ran outside, but by the time i got there, it had disappeared.

strange things have been happening in the skies over my area. besides the triangular ufos, i've noticed an increased amount of air traffic in my area, including an abundance of contrails, commercial planes, and this weird helicopter with some red and white lights that's been flying over my house recently.

i hope that someone can catch this thing on video or something before it just disappears.
content.summary: Giant triangular aircraft flies directly over my house.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi, my name is edward mundy. the date is may, 11 2009. i am 27 years old and when i have seen the ufo's i was about 9.

i will never forget what i have seen with my own two eyes. my friend and i were having a sleep over and were up till about 2am and we were looking out my windows. for some reason i seen that a flashing red light was blinking on top of the mountain for airplanes just in case they fly too low. the lights at that time were hardly ever on and for them to just start blinking for no reason was weird. so my friend and i were looking for a plane and all of a sudden we seen a purple and blue light blinking above the clouds. we kept watching and the sky actually opened up and a ufo came out of the opening and flew around the area it came out of and stopped. it shined a beam of light straight down and was moving the light around almost like shining a spotlight around looking around for something. 

then a few minutes later three more came out of the same hole in the sky and split up and went separate ways almost like looking for something. it didn't last long and the three smaller ones went back up in the hole in the sky and the bigger ufo before following back in the sky pulled its beam back up and shot something toward my back yard. my friend and i were scared because we didn't know what to think but for some reason i couldn't stop watching the ufo and it then went back in the hole in the sky and the lights faded and had gone. 

that morning we went and looked in the back yard and field and could not find anything. i am telling you this because i seen your show last night when you were in bucks county, pa. it struck me just then that the same thing happened to me that happened to these other people and i know that if this ufo shot the same thing that shot on your show that that guy has it has to still be there. i still know about where this thing landed. you can contact me by e-mail or my cell. (610)573-0860. i am giving you this number because i know what i seen, i know what happened. and will never forget it. again i know that thing has to still be there. thanks for your time. 
                                                                                                    ed mundy
content.summary: Multiple encounter with four ufo's

content.detailedDescription:
On may 22, 2009 at 10:38 pm in centralia, wa we saw a very bright oval object appear on our west horizon line, traveling w-e at a steady pace at what appeared to be approximately 3000 to 4000 feet in the air.  it passed our home making no sound at all and then it appeared to slow down as it approchaed a hill, then faded (started dimming) to a pale yellow then extinguished, as if one was blowing out a candel.  this entire event took place in five minutes.  we looked at it through very high powered binnoculars and looked for strobbing lights, red lights, a comet tail, fire, anything to explain that it was an aircraft, sattalite, meteor, etc.....It had none of these discriptives.  it was nothing like we have seen before.  

when we noticed the object we were in our back yard, putting away our telescope when we noticed the object thinking it was a very low flying plane.  i ran for the binnoculars and was able to capture it in the view finder.  no distinguishable shape other than the oval light.  no blinking lights, no colored lights and no sound.  we were trying to figure out what it was, and then it simply disappeared before our eyes, prior to the hill it was approaching.  it seemed that it needed to exstinguish it's lights before approaching the hill. (?)  then we saw it "blow out" and couldn't see the object any further.

our feelings?  very confused!  we wanted more than anything to explain what it was, and that's frustrating because it's like nothing we have ever seen.  we have no military testing bases anywhere near us, there is a small airport but this object had no strobe light or sound.  whatever it was it was flying very low to the ground, as we said, 3-4000 feet.
we are curious if anybody else in lewis county, wa saw the same object?
content.summary: Very bright oval object, no sound and moved steadily through our sky, dimmed and extinguished.  may 22, 2009 10:38 pm

content.detailedDescription:
Night, thrus. 5/21/09 , approx. 11:33 p.M.Est. went out as usual to stargaze, they weren't there, approx. 10:30 p.M. est.. went back out at 11:33 p.M. approx., suddenly there. first exact words i spoke were "they shouldn' be there". 3 stars/lights/objects, looked at first equidistant. 2 bottom lights spread apart, with 3rd light slightly elevated (dead center) above bottom 2 lights/objects. quickly bottom right light moved quickly to right of sky, very quickly disappeared. ran in to get bi-noculars. past experience has proven scope observation was too interfered with by close proximity to streetlamp. bi-noculars were bushnell 7 x 35, 420' @ 1000 yd.S., 140m @ 1000m, field 8 degrees. small upper circle to right of 8 i assume denoted degrees. then focuses directly on both lights separately. had definite point of reference to distinguish individual object movement by treelines (treetops)above neighbor's houses directly across street from my location (51 n. fawn dr., newark, de.). both lights/objects moved independently of each other, different altitudes and movement left and right. know i was seeing what i was seeing by fact that either one or both were moving above and below tree-lines (tops) at some times leaving line of sight. focused with bi-noculars as best poss., until very clear, but quit small orbs sighted. both objects/lights exhibited very, very rapid strobed light emissions with no apparrent paterns such as commercial aircraft. far left light/object faded, disappeared quickly. only left object was center one. faded in and out of visibility. as throughout event changing course up/down, left/right. at event end object faded, disappeared and event over. can't think of any more details.As stated in prior repot, have no idea my longitute, latitude,ascention. declination, azimuth, etc. but if you want an approx. trajectory of where they were in relation to my specific ground location, i'm at 51 n. fawn dr., i saw objects directly above middle of 43 & 41 n. fawn dr., if you want to get satelite photo of my exact line of reference point line of sight. sicerely, [cms/tg/pid].

p.S., please fpreward to "bw", ne,na. thankyou.
content.summary: 3 horizon stars/lights movement/never at that location before, shouldn't have been there.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting on our porch looking out at the lake when i noticed what first appeared to be a low altitude airplane with a huge orange glow to the middle of the object.  we got the binoculars because it appeared to be on fire.  upon further inspection it looked like a disk or oval shaped object with an orange fireball around its' mid-section.  it wasn't the typical flame that trails an object losing altitude, rather this object gained altitude fairly quickly and the fireball seemed to surround the object in a huge spike-like fashion. my wife believes she saw a pulsating white light, however i did not witness this.  there was absolutely no noise involved.  the object over the course of the next minute or so continued to gain altitude until we lost sight of it behind the clouds.  we wondered if this could possibly be some type of missle but quickly dismissed that idea.  all we know is this was not any type of aircraft we're familiar with.  we're still completely in awe of the whole event.
content.summary: Saw what appeared to be an aircraft on fire.

content.detailedDescription: It was monday may 18, 2009 when my fiance, a friend and i were sitting outside on our porch in the hot tub. we were all talking and i looked up at the sky to see if i could see the stars that night. i remember i noticed something coming out of the east side of the sky there were two orange or a dim red looking lights on two different aircrafts. i pointed this out to the others i was with and started joking around about being happy about not being on that plane.  there was clearly two crafts and they were a short distance apart. thats when i realized that they didn't look like airplanes at all. my fiance said that they had to be airplanes, although there was no flashing lights or anything that would look like a normal airplane. it was clompletly silent. we sat and watched them silently fly over us and as they did the two lights that were on both of the aircrafts turned into three lights in the shape of a triangle. it lasted for about 10-15 minutes. they just stayed the exact same distance apart and changed lights at the exact same time. when i finally couldnt see them anymore it was because they were out of my viewing area. i remember sitting there and just watching this happen not wanting to take my eyes off what i was seeing.
content.summary: Two lights on each craft then turning to three lights like  a triangle.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my front yard searching for my cats to bring them in for the night when i located my female cat who was looking up at the sky. so i looked up and to my amazement, a huge multi-leveled triangular object was hovering in the sky. i have never seen an aircraft that even looks remotely similar to this object. 

the object was in a vertical position in the shape of a triangle with white orbs illuminating its 3 points. the object was silent as it hovered. i stared at it for a few minutes before i went inside to get my binoculars. viewing the object through the binoculars, i noticed an alternating red and green pulsating light in each white orb. after i had been looking at the object for about 10 minutes, a small white orb quickly shot out of the left side (my left) of the object. at this point, i was wondering if i should call 911. i then walked to the property next door to get a different view of the object. this view revealed a silver cylinder rotating clockwise in the middle of the object. 

the object remained motionless and silent for 15 minutes before it just disappeared before my eyes. the event caught me by surprise, but it was exciting until the white orb shot out of the object. at that point, i became concerned for my safety.
content.summary: Triangle multi-leveled object hovered over highway 7 east for 15 minutes, then it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside of the restaurant where i had just eaten dinner and looked up into the sky. at about 40 degress above the western horizon i saw a brilliant white light. it was "pure" white, it didn't appear to radiate light nor glow, but it was very bright itself. it was moving in a west to east direction. it's altitude could not be determined. my friend suggested that maybe it was the space station, or a satellite, both of which i have seen through binoculars in the past. this object was far, far, too large to be either of those. it appeared to be about equal to 1/3 the diameter of a u.S. dime held at arm's length. it traveled silently from about 40 or 50 degrees above the west horizon, to about 50-60 degrees above the eastern horizon, and then, it instantly disappeared! the actual disappearance was so fast that my mind seemed a bit confused and delivered two simultaneous interpretations of what had just happened. one interpretation was that the object had "turned off" much like a light bulb does when it loses power. but, at the very same instant i thought i registered an extremely faint brownish-thin line projected tangentially from the object's last fully-illuminated position, off into the distance from the object, running for a length that seemed to be 20 to 30 times the width of the object. the object's "disappearance" was confusing because, as i indicated, at the same instant my mind registered the object "switching off" and becoming a speck of brown light that lasted only a millisecond or so, at the very same instant, there was the registering of an extremely thin brownish line running tangentially off into space. that line also lasted a very very short time. (it was kind of like the "trail" a sparkler leaves when quickly run across your field of vision, but thin, like a laser is thin.) i also would mention, that during the 2-3 minutes of this observation, there were aircraft approaching the nearby portland international airport and in holding patters with external lights and landing lights on. this object was clearly not an approaching nor a landing aircraft. and, i have also watched head-on-approaching, landing approach, landing-lights-on,  aircraft, many times, and this object was not one of those. and, also during the time this object was visible, there was an intercontinental jet at cruise altitude directly above us, and this object was certainly not one of those either. there were no visible lights (or anything similar to aircraft lights) on this aircraft. in addition to me, my friend saw the object in the sky (i summoned him from inside the restaurant), however, he did not see the actual "disappearance" occur, but did confirm he didn't see it after i watched it "blink out". i swear this report is accurate and true.
content.summary: Silent brilliant-matte-white light silently moves east-west, then disappears

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my route today when i passed with in 1000-1500 feet of the old allegeny axel building, when there was a small rumbleing coming from the plant and since the plant had been closed for a few months i had figured it was just some of the local goth scene doing one of their larp games in the plant when the rumbleing increased to a ear paining level. then sections of the old bay door had opened and judgeing by the size of the bay door i would belive the object was at least 8 and 1/2 feet wide and 10 feet long. hovering about 3-4 feet off the ground it came out of the bay horizontal before it made a lazy 90 degree turn to the sky and lifted about 20-30 feet high and then paused flashed a 15 second series of red, gold and blue lights before it turned 90 degrees again to become horizonal with the ground and then slowly turned towards the south west and started to slowly move forward before it shot off.

 one neighbor hood homless person approached me and asked if i just saw the tear of god leave. this was roughly 10 minutes later
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Tear drop rose out of the old axel building.

content.detailedDescription:
My name is mark woody i am a mufon member in utah, and a member of the utah ufo hunters (uufoh)  we just completed working on a couple of shooting scenes for the history channel's program ufo hunters.  anyway i just received a call and took some basic notes.  the eyewitmess is mass. got my info from our website aliendave.Com  i would like to forward this info to the masssachusettes state director so that he can send out a field investigator.  i feel this witness may be worth investigating, especially for his 1974 sighting.  witness claims that he did take a photo of today's sighting

phone call received  22 may 2009

1974

20-25 miles south of boston mass

wrote betty hill and receive a reply���

red light���  turned bright white���  sparks shoot out of it.  craft was large as a house, witness could have hit it with a rock.

no sound

22 may-2009  today

red on top yellow middle green (solid colors) hidden in strange clouds

brocken, massachusetts

mike mansulla   774-274-9636



mark woody ���asst. director utah ufo hunters, mufon
content.summary: 1974 house size ufo / new sighting today.

content.detailedDescription:
Walked on to front porch facing south to smoke a cig., looked right and noticed looked like a red light hovering in distance over tree tops like a chopper but didn't hear it. it was a bright red light and it looked like it was sort of faintly strobing. i watched it hover then it slowly at a snails pace moved south for several seconds like it was going to cross hwy. 67 and suddenly it got up to mach one speed like a fighter jet and hit a 45 degree angle and shot like a beam of light west and disapeared with a tiny beam of light that reminded me of a sewing needle behind it. i could hold a nickel up and thats the distance away.I felt like i had just saw a ghost. i was alone and my husband was in the bed asleep. i went in an woke him up and of course he didn't take me serious. it was unbelievable and my knees bent under me and i felt almost sick because i never actually believed that i would ever be one to see that sort of thing. i wonder what they are looking for , their purpose, what they want and how they fit into reality if u will. very scary that i know man doesn't have those type of aircraft capabilities and what is next, i don't want to see another.
about 4 months before sightings in stephenville,my daughter looked south out the window and ran to the north back door and told her dad and i to look and a huge airplane like a b-2 but way bigger flew was flying over our house at only about 1500 - 2000 feet and it scared us that it was flying so low it would crash. it was flying parallel with i-35w headed north towards burleson, texas. there is spinks airport in burleson but have never seen a aircraft of that size land there.
sometime before the 2005 sighting, i was sitting outside again looking at the stars west and saw what looked like a star in the way far distance shoot out like a star but it was going in a slanted upward position.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.shape: Bullet,  Missile,  Circle,  Fireball,  Flash,  Star-like
content.summary: Hover, slow snail pace, mach one, 45 degree angle shot at light speed from south to west direction.

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up on may 20th at 4:30 , looked out my window and the sky to the south west 
above the clouds was a continuos light throb, not flashing but more of a throbbing in a 20 -30
mile area one throb per second. let me make this clear it was coming from the top of the clouds not belowand it lasted until 6:30. i would love to know if anyone saw this. it was right over pch
going to manhattan beach from playa del rey, ca.
i called channel 7 news and the police. the police finally got there when the sun rose
and it was gone. the news... who knows. but that is how worried i was!
i did grab my camera to film it but i do not have very good night camera.
if you watch the film i have attached several times you can see the sky throbbing,
i know this sounds crazy but i have not seen it since and i have been looking!
next time i will get in my car and go closer!
content.summary: Throbbing lights in the sky over lax!
